Articles.Content:
so i was doing an eeloo mission and at the end i had a fair bit of spare fuel in the lander reserves after hitting all the biomes.  since my return vessel was nuclear, and i didnt need the oxidizer, i thought wouldnt it be nice if i could just vent my unwanted oxidizer lol

it would also come in handy when using a 2.5m tank and you forget to empty the oxidizer in the VAB lol

TAC Fuel Balancer - Looks like it is v1.2 compatible too.

I've been missing this mod in my Minmus Fuel Station setup - very glad to see it back!
